All Classes

  • All Classes Class Summary Enum Summary Exception Summary 
    Class Description
    alreadyExistsAuthor
    This exception is thrown whenever trying to add a new author that is already on the database.
    alreadyExistsDoc
    This exception is thrown whenever a new document is created but it already exists in the database.
    alreadyExistsQuery
    This exception is thrown whenever a new query is added but the query already exists in the database.
    AndNode
    This class represents and AndNode in the queries.
    authorWithoutDocs
    This exception is thrown whenever an documents search by author is done but the author doesn't have documents.
    Configuration
    This class represents the configuration.
    ConfigurationManager
    This class is the Configuration Manager, it is responsible for loading and saving the configuration.
    ContentManager
    This class is the Content Manager, it is responsible for loading and saving the content.
    Contents
    This class reprsents the content of a document including the term frequencies, the number of words ...
    Document
    This class represents the metadata and attributes of a document.
    DocumentAlreadyExists
    This exception is thrown whenever the user tries to upload a file and the document already exits in the system
    DocumentController
    DocumentController class is responsible for handling document-related actions such as creation, uploading, and deletion.
    DocumentManager
    This class is the Document Manager, it is responsible for loading and saving the documents.
    emptyAuthor
    This exception is thrown whenever the field of author is empty.
    emptyTitle
    This exception is thrown whenever the title field is empty.
    FileAlreadyExists
    This exception is thrown whenever the user tries to download a file that already exists with the same name in that directory
    FileController
    This class has the main purpose of carrying out all the import and export funcionalities that this project offers, just to help the Domain Controller in difficult tasks.
    FileDoesntExists
    This exception is thrown whenever the user tries to upload
    ForbiddenExtension
    Exception used in multiple cases where the format is not supported by this program (sus,txt,xml)
    IndexManager
    This class is the Index Manager, it is responsible for loading and saving the indexs (Trie, Inverted Index and Vectorial Index).
    InvertedIndex
    This class represents the InvertedIndex.
    LeafNode
    This class represents the LeafNode in the queries.
    modeNotFound
    This exception is thrown the looked for node is not found.
    notEnoughDocuments
    This exception is thrown whenever there are not enough documents to return.
    notFoundAuthor
    This exception is thrown whenever the author looked for is not found.
    notFoundDocument
    This exception is thrown whenever the document looked for is not found.
    notFoundQuery
    This exception is thrown whenever the query looked for is not found.
    NotNode
    This class represents the NotNode in the queries.
    OrNode
    This class represents the OrNode in the queries.
    PersistenceController
    This class represents the persistence controller, it is responsible of downloading and uploading all the files that can be saved.
    PresentationController
    This class represents the Presentation Controller, it is in charge of controlling all the graphical interface of the program.
    Query
    This class represents the Query for the queries search.
    Query.type  
    QueryManager
    This class is the Query Manager, it is responsible for loading and saving the queries.
    QueryNode
    This class represents a QueryNode.
    queryNotCorrect
    This exception is thrown whenever the format of a new given query is not correct.
    Result
    This class represents the Result of a search.
    SearchController
    The SearchController class allows searching for documents in the system by different criteria such as author, relevance, similitude, boolean expression, or title.
    Sentence
    This class represents a Sentence.
    StopWords
    This class represents the StopWords.
    SUSController  
    Trie
    This class represents the Trie data Structure.
    TXTController
    This class represents the Controller in charge of the downloading and uploading the .txt files.
    UnrecognisableFormatting
    Exception raised whenever the uploaded documents are not in the correct format even though the extension is fine (sus,txt,xml), so its unreadable by the parsing program The format in all three extensions is: -sus: Title ==> title Author ==> author content -txt: title author content -xml: ...
    VectorialIndex
    This class represents a Vectorial Index.
    XMLController
    This class represents the Controller in charge of the downloading and uploading the .xml files.
